getJobInfo

public static OutputJobInfo getJobInfo(Configuration conf)
                                throws IOException
Gets the HCatOuputJobInfo object by reading the Configuration and deserializing the string. If InputJobInfo is not present in the configuration, throws an exception since that means HCatOutputFormat.setOutput has not been called.

Parameters:
conf - the job Configuration object
Returns:
the OutputJobInfo object
Throws:
IOException - the IO exception
